page.title: 04Home life-Changing Times
page.content: When our parents were our age they played games like,tinwhip,deligo,and marbles.33% then had a car,now 75% have one.Since those days schools have changed.Dicipline was more strict and you got the cane.Village life has changed very little,there used to be a brook in the street but now it's blocked up and some old houses have been knocked down.The pub replaces them now.1/6d,2/6d and a crown was usually their pocket money.Some got none.They usually spent it on sweets or the pictures.The fashions were bell legged trousers and mini skirts.In their spare time they would go for a walk or listen to the radio.50% had bikes then,now 80% have bikes.Our living conditions have changed a lot since then,because now we have modern machines to use.
